mapper.select: SELECT SEQ as seq ,CHARGE_ID as chargeId ,ROLE_ID as roleId ,(SELECT ROLE_NAME FROM CTN_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID = T1.ROLE_ID ) as roleName ,UNIQ_ID as uniqId ,PASSWORD as password ,MBER_NAME as mberName ,MBER_STTUS as mberSttus ,MOBLPHON_NO as moblphonNo ,EMAIL_ADDRESS as emailAddress ,FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId ,FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM as frstRegisterPnttm ,LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM as lastUpdusrPnttm FROM CTN_NRLMBER T1 WHERE 1=1 AND UNIQ_ID = #{uniqid} AND PASSWORD = password(#{password}) AND MBER_STTUS = 'A'
